properties.entry: On this page you can import existing teams (groups) from an LDAP server into the U-QASAR platform.
In order to start import of LDAP groups you first have to retrieve a list of existing LDAP groups and then select the ones to be imported as teams.
The retrieval of teams will be performed according to the LDAP settings for the group mapping

Additionally, all users belonging to an LDAP group will be imported according to the the LDAP settings for the user mapping. In case an LDAP-based user is already existent in the U-QASAR platform, it will not be imported once again but only be added to the imported team (group)
(click here to revise or change LDAP group mappings)
(click here to revise or change LDAP user mappings)

Please note, that certain LDAP groups may not be imported in case another team (group) in the U-QASAR platform exists, that has the same name as the LDAP group to be imported. Those non-importable groups
will be marked as such by color and a curresponding pointer.
Role of users within the imported teams
Retrieve teams (groups) from LDAP for selection
Not importing a user with user e-Mail address {mail} because it already exists.
Not importing a user with user name {userName}, because it already exists.
